Roadmaster Drivers School Sponsored Professional truck drivers have an enormous role to play during these uncertain times. Just as past generations have risen to the great tests of their time, so will we. In one month, you can start a career as a professional truck driver by training at Roadmaster Drivers School. As you may have seen, even during these uncertain times, trucks are an essential part of our infrastructure and they don't stop rolling.
